source.name: EPA Water Services - Name Service
source.description: The WATERS Web and Database services provide open interfaces to complex analyses. These services make extensive use of the NHD and referenced program data in the RAD, and also integrate other WATERS program data. Designed as loosely coupled modular units, the services are developed in a common architecture. Advanced query function to find U.S. Geological Survey GNIS (Geographic Names Information System) water feature names and provide general location information for National Hydrography Dataset features.
